Parameter.name: ConsoleTimeout
Parameter.description: Time required in order for the telnet/ssh server embedded in the AP to reset the connection (in minutes)

Parameter.name: APC_AccessPoint
Parameter.description: Name of the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_IP
Parameter.description: IP address of the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_UserName
Parameter.description: Username to use to connect to the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_Password
Parameter.description: Password to use to connect to the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_SerialPortIP
Parameter.description: Virtual IP address of the serial port connected to the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_HostName
Parameter.description: Hostname of the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_PowerSwitchPort
Parameter.description: Power switch port to use to control the reboot of the AP to use behind the AP controller of the conformance bench

Parameter.name: APC_PowerSwitchPorts
Parameter.description: List of ports available for controlling power of all AP of the bench

Parameter.name: EAP_SIM_user
Parameter.description: SIM user specified in radius server configuration

Parameter.name: EAP_AKA_user
Parameter.description: AKA user specified in radius server configuration
